text: Amos Cardarelli (6 March 1930 - 1 July 2018) was an Italian professional footballer. He played as a defender. Cardarelli was born in Monterotondo, Italy. He played for Roma (1950–1957), Udinese (1957–1958), Internazionale (1958–1960), Lecco (1960–1962) and for Tevere Roma (1962–1963). Cardarelli died on 1 July 2018 in Rome at the age of 86.Roma: morto Amos Cardarelli, cresciuto a due passi dal Trieste-Salario ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Footballers from Lazio
title: Amos Cardarelli
